name: Another one's Treasure
description:
"Dear nephew, my days here ended. I should move on. I know you stuck with your life goals. Let me help you reset your life - try to start a new one in my house. Start where I ended and finish my jorney."

"Start at the end" - gamejam theme.

You never met your uncle. Now he's gone - you don't know where he is. You received a letter from him with keys of his house. 

He always kept everthing about his life secret. Now it's time to uncover those secrets, pack precious belongings, throw away the garbage.

Controls:

  1. WASD / mouse move - move the camera
  2. Q/E - rotate the camera
  3. Mouse wheel - zoom in / out
  4. Left click on an item, drag and drop into a box / garbage truck.

Goals:

  1. Find and sort all precious items. They score 10.
  2. Throw away all the garbage.  Each garbage item scores 1.
  3. The game finishes when all items are sorted / thrown in a garbage truck.

September 2022 IrishJohnGames jam
